Name: Cogito
About the game: Cogito is a puzzle game for the HTC Vive that contains increasingly difficult puzzles in the realm of escape-room style puzzles, logic puzzles, spatial reasoning, and memory. You'll have to use your brain to its utmost potential to decipher puzzles, ciphers, and patterns! Currently only has support for the HTC Vive.
Meta Title: Cogito: Oct 14, 2016, Evan Downing and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Cogito? Check out the release date (Oct 14, 2016), developer insights from Evan Downing, and a complete game summary.
